11.content:
Goten was just coming inside after another day of training with his big brother, Gohan for the world martial arts tournament that would be taking place next month. As he came inside, he saw his mother, Chichi bottle feeding a blonde baby girl.

"Hey mom. Is that Krillin's baby?" He asked.

"Yes. He asked me to babysit for him today." said Chichi warmly. "Oop. I think we have a little stinky!" She raised the baby's dress and changed her diaper. Goten smiled, thinking that this must have been how his mother changed him when he was that age. Then he felt a strange sense of curiosity about the scene. Not about how things were when he was tiny, but about the white garment that Chichi was tapping onto the infant she was babysitting. he didn't know why, but for some reason, he wanted to wear one...

"Hm? Is something wrong, Goten??" Chichi asked, noticing Goten's attention drifting out of focus.

"Uh, no. Nothing." said Goten quickly. "I was just curious, um.... where you ever like that with me when I was really little?" Chichi giggled.

"Of course I was, silly." She smiled. "You were the sweetest little baby boy."

"Uh, thanks mom." said Goten, happily but embarrassed, his face turning pink. He was glad Gohan hadn't come back in yet. "Good night mom. Love you." He rushed upstairs, still quite embarrassed. For some reason, he wanted to be in Marron's tiny shoes. If not being adored and babied by his mother, than at least wearing the possibly very comfortable diapers that a baby wore."

"But I'm 7 years old." Goten thought to himself as he lay in bed. "I shouldn't want to be in diapers. They're for babies! I can't be thinking like this, not when the world tournament's coming around." He suddenly got a very strange and humiliating mental vision of himself in nothing but a diaper being introduced as 'the world's biggest baby,' and being laughed at by the crowd, Trunks rolling on the arena floor, laughing his ass off. Goten shook it off, then returned his thoughts to his sense of curiosity. Noticing the last of the lights in the house go out through the crack under his door, he crept outside, sneaking into the kitchen, where he remembered a pack of baby diapers being.
Making sure he was alone, he carefully slid one of the diapers out of the pack, unfolded it, and tried to put it on. It was much too small for a growing boy his age, but the soft insides of the diaper felt tremendously comfortable. He only wished it could fit. He folded the diaper back up and put it back as best he could, and went back up to bed.

“That sure was comfy.” He thought as went back to his room. “I should get some that actually fit me.” He searched an old toy box for his money hiding spot, and counted up the money he saved so far. “I wonder if this is enough…” He thought. He shrugged and, tired, he went to bed.

The next day….

Chi-Chi had asked Goten if he'd like to go shopping, and Goten was happy to, as he'd be able to finally start the plan. After arriving Chi-Chi grabbed the two largest carts she could find she stuffed as much food as possible into them for the next fortnightly supply. As they cruised aisle to aisle Chi-Chi stopped in the baby aisle to pick up a few wipes. Goten stopped in his tracks and this caught Chi-Chi's eye.

"Goten, what's wrong?" Chi-Chi was confused.

"Umm... I don't really know how to say it." Goten knew what he wanted and knew it wouldn't be easy.

"Just tell me. If you want something I can only help if you tell me."

"I... Umm... Want to be your baby again."

"Wow... Okay. What do you mean "baby"?"

"I want to be like Marron. All the diapers and bottles. I want to be like that again."

"OK. That's fine. Want to help me pick out some diapers, bottles and more for you?"

"Yeah."

Chi-Chi let Goten pick out 8 pacifiers of his choosing and 2 boxes of bottles. They found a package with blue cartoony diapers with tapes and Chi-Chi grabbed some bibs, onesies, baby vests etc. And to be delivered to her home she got the early delivery service to send a stroller, crib, changing table, rocker
and a high chair.

After returning home and putting all the shopping away. Chi-Chi knew she had another 3 hours before the delivery was due so she got goten ready for a bath. After getting him out she thoroughly dried him and put a diaper on Goten. He wasn't used to it but he liked how soft and cushiony the diaper felt. He was then put in a vest with the word "hero" written across and a onesie with a dinosaur. Chi-Chi then brought Goten downstairs and sat him on the couch and told him to wait while she makes him a warm bottle. Minutes passed and Chi-Chi returned and had a bottle of milk in her hand. Whilst she fed goten she had just a few simle rules for him.

1. Bedtime is the usual 8PM

2. You can only use your diapers.

3. If you want a bottle just ask.

4. Your pacifier can be used whenever you like, but will be used at bedtime.

115.content:
"Goten? Are you alright?" Chichi asked. Goten had taken a break from training for the day, so Gohan was a ways away, teaching his classmate Videl to fly. Goten flushed at the question, then responded,

"Um, mom... Do you miss me being a baby?" Goten asked. Chichi blinked at him.

"What brought this up??" She asked.

"Well, I don't really know," said Goten, feeling more awkward all the time. "But for some reason, I kinda want you to... um... be my mommy again."

"Goten, I am still your mom." Chichi said warmly. "Why would you think I wasn't?"

"No not just my mother. I mean my mommy." said Goten. "I want to be your..." He swallowed, very embarassed now to admit it. "Your sweet baby boy again." Chichi blinked at him again, then smiled.

"Alright. If that's what you want, then okay." She said kindly.

"Um, I mean, every bit like your sweet baby boy." Goten admitted. He didn't know whether to feel ashamed or releived to be saying this. "I want to wear diapers, I want you to rock me, I want to be babied." now Chichi seemed a little pink in the face.

"If that's what my sweet baby boy wants." She said, stroking Goten's spiky hair. She wrote a quick note for Gohan, and took Goten out shopping for diapers and the like. When they went back, it was to find another note from Gohan, saying that he went to study with Videl. Goten was okay with this, he didn't want Gohan to know anyway, and Chichi diapered her little boy, rocked him in her arms, and treated him like the baby he wanted to be.

"Thanks mommy.” Goten smiled as he sat in his mother’s arms.

“Of course.” said Chichi sweetly. A growling sound could be heard, and she smiled. “Someone’s hungry, isn’t he?” She giggled.
